title: (x) Squarish techno text sans - Soho Gothic {Chris Cousins}
content:
Can anyone help ID this font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120303125351im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_5214.jpg)
author: splinter

comments.content: Yes, it is a font. Would you like some additinional information of it?
If you want to know the font, go with: "The latest activity" sans with no idea. That should work.
I thought it was Neo Sans Medium, but now I don't think it is. The bottom of the lowercase d looks different, as does the y.
Hey splinter - looks like [Soho Gothic Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20120303125351/http:/www.faces.co.uk/fonts/Monotype-Imaging-Vols/Soho-Gothic-Volume-One-MTOPN616533/) to me.

BTW What Tomi meant is that you should make your thread title a little more descriptive, something like:  
“The latest activity” sans with no idea

It is very hard for us to distinguish the different requests if they all have titles like "Font", "Please help me", "What is this font", Type ID", and so on. It's as if we were trying to read a newspaper and every headline shouted "Stuff happened!" ;^)
